scripts.build: vite build & rm -rf ../wigitback/assets/*.js & rm -rf ../wigitback/assets/*.css  & cp -R ./dist/assets ../wigitback/ & cp ./dist/index.html ../wigitback/
scripts.test: vite build & rm -rf ../test/assets/*.js & rm -rf ../test/assets/*.css  & cp -R ./dist/assets ../test/ & cp ./dist/index.html ../test/
